byline.contributor: Nicholas Kulish contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Immigrants’ rights advocates say a broadened definition of the term “criminal alien” could put a majority of unauthorized immigrants in the United States at risk of deportation.
snippet: Immigrants’ rights advocates say a broadened definition of the term “criminal alien” could put a majority of unauthorized immigrants in the United States at risk of deportation....

headline.main: She Showed Up Yearly to Meet Immigration Agents. Now They’ve Deported Her.
headline.print_headline: She Met Yearly With Immigration Agents. Now They’ve Deported Her.
